transcend.4_1:
ATK DEF HP +16%
+2% Ally Team Accuracy
+1 Chain Passive Weakness Gauge damage
transcend.6:
ATK DEF HP +30%
+2% Ally Team Accuracy
+25 Action Points at battle start

SKT_FIRST.name: Saikashuu Gunnery
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>40%</color> chance to inflict reduced <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000064_1_1]</color> chance to inflict reduced <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000064_1_1] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_SECOND.name: Barrier of Ryouran
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Attacks all enemies. After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to increase the duration of debuffs on the enemy by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>, then inflicts reduced <color=#28d9ed>Resilience</color> on targets without debuffs for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.

SKT_BURST_1.effect: +1 turn reduced Critical Hit Chance on target

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Changes skill effect order\n(Debuff duration increase applies last)

description: Attacks all enemies. After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000064_2_1]</color> chance to increase the duration of debuffs on the enemy by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000064_2_1] turn(s)</color>, then inflicts reduced <color=#28d9ed>Resilience</color> on targets without debuffs for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000064_2_2] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Juzumaru Tsunetsugu
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies, and has a <color=#28d9ed>80%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Unbuffable</color> and <color=#28d9ed>Reduced Defense</color> on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.\nRight after using this skill, has a <color=#28d9ed>80%</color> chance to avoid triggering an enemy's Counterattack, Revenge, or Agile Response.
description: Attacks all enemies, and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000064_3_2]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Unbuffable</color> and <color=#28d9ed>Reduced Defense</color> on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000064_3_2] turn(s)</color>.\nRight after using this skill, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000064_3_1]</color> chance to avoid triggering an enemy's Counterattack, Revenge, or Agile Response.

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color>: Grants all allies increased <color=#28d9ed>Accuracy</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>, then attacks an enemy.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to inflict reduced <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> on the enemy target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color>: Grants all allies increased <color=#28d9ed>Accuracy</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000064_chain_1_1] turn(s)</color>, then attacks an enemy.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000064_backup_1_1]</color> chance to inflict reduced <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> on the enemy target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000064_backup_1_1] turn(s)</color>.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
